New Records: Riley Greene hit his 19th home run of the season
Key Match Events: Riley Greene and Kerry Carpenter homered in a three-run sixth inning
Jake Rogers homered to center in the bottom of the fifth inning
Greene made it 4-2 with a long homer, his 19th, to center in the sixth
Pre-Game Insights: The start of the game was delayed 2 hours, 45 minutes by heavy storms
Post-Match Reflections: Angels manager Ron Washington said 'The triple didn't even get to the warning track â€” that's just a miscommunication on our part'
Riley Greene said 'This was late, but we wanted to get it in so we didn't have to play two tomorrow'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Angels have lost six straight and 12 of their last 14 games
The Angels placed LHP Matt Moore on the 15-day injured list with a left forearm strain
The teams play the second game of the series on Wednesday
